name: DeckChain
description:
Submission for the Azure Lux Game Jam.

Made by One person.

All assets used were made by me and  the rest gotten free from the unity asset store

Uhnity Dream shooter tutorial , Brackley 2D Mega Pack and Kenny Game Assets the free versions, escrett music.

Fix data sync to PlayFab

Fix Playfab sync for shop/Player bonus

Assign the sorting of eck from player pref to playfab

Fix Playagain button at end game panel

Waves will continue after 12

Fix multiple spawn of players projectiled

Fix Ai stopping randomly

Instructions:

Left Mouse Click/Space: Attack /Use card

Right Mouse Click: to dash

Q/Z : To stack deck for chain attack

E/X: To active stack cards for Chain Attack

C:P Cancel the sequecne

Escape Key: To Pause game
